channel.title: Daniel Schmachtenberger on sustainable economic systems
channel.description: Daniel was recently on a podcast with Lex Fridman but the discussion is 4 hours long so even at 2x playback speed it's a lot to get through. Fortunately, Daniel has written about most of what was discussed: [New Economic Series: Part 4](https://civilizationemerging.com/new-economics-series-4/). I found the article interesting and I think there are some worthwhile ideas in the article related to better decision making systems and tools that can operate over multiple scales.
